column2: On the question of delay,  the petitioners have failed to adduce
any plausible explanation and above  all  the explanation with
regard  to  the  date  on  which  they  applied  for  certified  copies
appears to  be incorrect.  Hence,  the explanation given by the

column1: jurisdiction of the  High  Court cannot be  accepted.  Therefore

column2: the  petitioners  in  the  High  Court  were  guilty  of  laches  in
invoking  the  revisionary  powers  of the  High  Court.  As  such

column5: learned  High  Court  Judge  cannot  be

column2: allowed  to  remain.  In  the  result,  this  appeal  is  allowed  and
